description: This table contains the tourniquets information for the surgical log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: TOURNIQUET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of tourniquet


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TOURNIQUET_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The body area to which the tourniquet was applied.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TOURN_AREA_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The laterality of the body area.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default

columns.name: TOURNIQUET_PRESSUR
columns.description: The pressure setting of the tourniquet

columns.name: TOURN_CUFF_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The tourniquet cuff size category number for the log.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: OCCLUSION_PRESSUR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The limb occlusion pressure category number indicates if high or low pressure was applied with limb occlusion.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


NO


YES


N/A

columns.name: TOURN_PAD_APPLIED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if tourniquet padding was applied.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No (Old)


Yes (Old)


N/A (Old)


Yes


No


N/A

columns.name: TOURN_PULSE_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the extremity site where the pre-tourniquet pulse was measured.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: TOURN_PULSE_RYTM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the measured pre-tourniquet extremity pulse rhythm.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: TOURNIQUET_PRESSR_2
columns.description: This item stores the second tourniquet pressure.

columns.name: TOURNIQUET_PRESSR_3
columns.description: This item stores the third tourniquet pressure.

columns.name: TOURNIQUET_PRESSR_4
columns.description: This item stores the fourth tourniquet pressure.

columns.name: TOURNIQUET_PRESSR_5
columns.description: This item stores the fifth tourniquet pressure.
